short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refreshes Google Contacts when left open so the newest data is always available!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Since Google Contacts does not refresh the active tab with contact changes, this will automatically refresh any Google Contacts tabs when focused.
